purpose: Enhance developer productivity by providing AI-assisted coding suggestions and improvements
principle: Utilizes AI models like Claude, GPT, and others to generate code suggestions and improvements in real-time
reusability: Can be integrated into various development environments via command-line interface and supports multiple AI models
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited functionality and stability issues
name: forge
description: AI enabled pair programmer for Claude, GPT, O Series, Grok, Deepseek, Gemini and 300+ models
highlight: Supports integration with over 300 AI models for pair programming
